attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Studies show that in previous years, the days following the start of British Summer Time have seen an increase in road traffic accidents and an economic downturn.   

On a personal level, I hate the fact that I have to put my watch forward every spring and therefore have a precious hour of my life stolen from me for no good reason.

The whole thing seems totally unnecessary, especially as it was introduced nearly 100 years ago. 

I feel tired for days afterwards and the worst thing is that just when you think its getting lighter when you wake up in the morning, it goes back to wintery darkness.
